author: cziegeler
msg: Write first element in pom in one line (to avoid problems with the maven release plugin) and minor pom fixes.

author: trustin
msg: Fixed issue: DIRMIMNA-569 - KeepAliveFilter's BOTH_IDLE is not working as expected
* Added the contributed test case for KeepAliveFilter
* Fixed KeepAliveFilter to work correctly when the interestedIdleStatus is BOTH_IDLE by adding IGNORE_READER_IDLE_ONCE attribute

author: ate
msg: Bumping required maven-2 version to 2.0.9 (just released).
This maven update fixes a bug which had me duplicate the deploy plugin but now that attached-deploy plugin isn't needed anymore.
